sqlMap.insert:
INSERT /*MS-YRD-INVOICE-REQUISITION-INSERT*/ INTO invoice_requisition(invoice_requisition_id,insurance_no,insurance_company_id,insurance_company_name,identify_number,org_address,open_bank_name,mobile,bank_card_no,capital_amount,small_amount,apply_no,settlement_no,apply_time,apply_user_id,apply_user_name,apply_deptment,department_charger,leader,remark) VALUES (#invoiceRequisitionId#,#insuranceNo#,#insuranceCompanyId#,#insuranceCompanyName#,#identifyNumber#,#orgAddress#,#openBankName#,#mobile#,#bankCardNo#,#capitalAmount#,#smallAmount#,#applyNo#,#settlementNo#,#applyTime#,#applyUserId#,#applyUserName#,#applyDeptment#,#departmentCharger#,#leader#,#remark#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-INVOICE-REQUISITION-UPDATE*/ invoice_requisition set insurance_no=#insuranceNo#, insurance_company_id=#insuranceCompanyId#, insurance_company_name=#insuranceCompanyName#, identify_number=#identifyNumber#, org_address=#orgAddress#, open_bank_name=#openBankName#, mobile=#mobile#, bank_card_no=#bankCardNo#, capital_amount=#capitalAmount#, small_amount=#smallAmount#, apply_no=#applyNo#, settlement_no=#settlementNo#, apply_time=#applyTime#, apply_user_id=#applyUserId#, apply_user_name=#applyUserName#, apply_deptment=#applyDeptment#, department_charger=#departmentCharger#, leader=#leader#, remark=#remark# where (invoice_requisition_id = #invoiceRequisitionId#)
sqlMap.select: select /*MS-YRD-INVOICE-REQUISITION-FIND-BY-ID*/ invoice_requisition_id, insurance_no, insurance_company_id, insurance_company_name, identify_number, org_address, open_bank_name, mobile, bank_card_no, capital_amount, small_amount, apply_no, settlement_no, apply_time, apply_user_id, apply_user_name, apply_deptment, department_charger, leader, remark from invoice_requisition where (invoice_requisition_id = #value#)

SELECT /*MS-YRD-INVOICE-REQUISITION-FIND-BY-CONDITION*/ invoice_requisition_id ,insurance_no ,insurance_company_id ,insurance_company_name ,identify_number ,org_address ,open_bank_name ,mobile ,bank_card_no ,capital_amount ,small_amount ,apply_no ,settlement_no ,apply_time ,apply_user_id ,apply_user_name ,apply_deptment ,department_charger ,leader ,remark FROM invoice_requisition where 1=1
$sortCol$
$sortOrder$
LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#

SELECT /*MS-YRD-INVOICE-REQUISITION-GET-INVOICE-REQUISITION-INFO*/ invoice_requisition_id ,insurance_no ,insurance_company_id ,insurance_company_name ,identify_number ,org_address ,open_bank_name ,mobile ,bank_card_no ,capital_amount ,small_amount ,apply_no ,settlement_no ,apply_time ,apply_user_id ,apply_user_name ,apply_deptment ,department_charger ,leader ,remark FROM invoice_requisition where settlement_no = #billNo#
